multiplechoiceresponse.label: The same project, where the issue with the 8 employees wanting to leave has continued. After having meetings with them, 3 decide to stay with the company. Although you suppose most of them leave for a position that is paid better, with your project team, you go through the Read step, trying to assess why so many employees want to leave, just 2 months after the start. Surprisingly, only 1 out of the 8 explains the salary as the main reason for leaving. 6 out of 8 share that they were expecting a different kind of work and responsibilities when starting. What would you do to Respond and overcome the issues from happening again?

choicegroup.choice: Update the hiring process and make HR team have a dedicated time with each candidate to explain well the requireents and responsibilities of the position
Have sessions with the remaining 22 employees, check for any other people that have the same concern and try to close the expectation gap and prevent others from leaving
